reference.file = human_g1k_v37_decoy.fasta intervals = gaf_20111020+broad_wex_1.1_hg19.bed sample.id = (identifier string for the sample) clean.bam.file = (input tumor bam file) normal.bam = (input normal bam file) genotypes.vcf = none pop.vcf = hg19_population_stratified_af_hapmap_3.3.fixed.vcf force.array.free = true snp.six.bed = SNP6.hg19.interval_list
Output (sample.id).contamination.txt.firehose
The value is by itself on a line. A common cutoff we have used for TCGA is requiring the value to be <4.0 to pass. Example output files are given in PCAWG-BLCA-US-S-TCGA-BT-A20T-01A-11D-A14W-08.*
